attributes.contentHtml: I kinda figured he was a scammer, he tried convincing me, but, now that I checked things out, turns out his host foxynodes is as bad as metricnodes, and he also was quite rude towards me, and now I find this very thread on him here, honestly, @RianOP I am calling you out now, I looked into everything I was told by ansh, and everything checked out on HIS side of the story and none of what you said to me held any legitimacy of fact, you claim I should go get checked into a mental hospital and touch grass? maybe you should follow your own advice and get a life, touch some grass and get checked into a mental hospital and get the help you need, because if you're that damaged that you must attack others for an opposing opinion and for exposing you to the truth? then you've got serious mental issues, especially when you are abusing server trials and selling what should be offered for free to see if the potential buyer might like the service. foxynodes trustpilot I can guarantee you bought and paid for each of the positive reviews on this trust pilot entry on your host.
Plaguewave7 that fucking shit host is still alive? i can't believe it
